recommendations.recommendation: More Gintama awesomeness, no fillers, comedy aspect still there but the plot progresses, getting more intense, looking forward to more :D

anime.description: In a world where aliens have invaded Edo Period Japan, skyscrapers, trains and motor bikes have replaced the simple life of Earth inhabitants. One man however, still carries the soul of a samurai, http://anidb.net/ch1162 [Sakata Gintoki], otherwise known as Yorozuya Gin-san. As reckless as he is, Gintoki carries his own resolve and is ready to take on any challenge with his fellow companions. Source: crunchyroll

character.name: Sakata Gintoki
character.description: Sakata Gintoki is the main character of the story. He has naturally permed hair, which he blames for his lack of a love-life. He rides a motor scooter and wields a bokuto, which has "Lake Touya" inscribed on it. His job, as is written on his business card, is a "free-lancer", meaning he`ll take any job for nearly any price. He enjoys reading http://anidb.net/cr5372 [Shounen Jump] comics and he has a sweet tooth and will go into crazed combat if he does not have his sweets (he has glycosuria). In the past, he was a Joui (someone who attempted to overthrow Amanto to protect the government). The reason Gintoki does not join http://anidb.net/ch1165 [Katsura Kotarou] again to fight the aliens is that he does not like to fight alongside "gloomy terrorists".

character.name: Shimura Shinpachi
character.description: Shinpachi Shimura works under Gintoki to learn the ways of the samurai. He used to stay at his family`s doujo. However, it seems more like he`s just trying to help Gintoki pay the rent than to learn. Shinpachi is the captain of the "Otsu`s Imperial Guard," a pop-singer`s fan club, and takes his role seriously. Other members of the fan club treat him with utmost respect, something he isn`t treated with usually.

character.name: Kagura
character.description: Although she appears to be a normal, cute, human girl in Chinese-style clothing, she actually belongs to the Yato Clan, one of the strongest and most bloodthirsty of the Amanto races, although Kagura rejects that part of herself. The Yato are said to have "transparent" (snow-white) skin that is highly sensitive to sunlight, so Kagura carries a purple parasol at all times. The parasol is also the Yato clan`s weapon of choice; Kagura`s is bulletproof and fires bullets from its tip. Because of her Yato blood, she is super-strong and can stop a speeding motorscooter with one hand. Although stronger than most humans, she cannot control her strength perfectly. Her super-human strength makes her extremely bad with pets. Most of her pets, with the exception of Sadaharu, have met with an untimely demise by her hands.

character.name: Katsura Kotarou
character.description: Katsura is Gintoki`s former comrade during the Joi war. Even after the Amanto take-over of Japan, Katsura continues to resist the Amanto, and has amassed a band of followers. His weapon of choice is a metallic grenade. He is a wanted man due to his involvement in terrorist activities against the Bakufu, and is constantly on the run from the Shinsengumi. Although his initial methods were originally more violent in nature (for instance, sending a bomb to an Amanto embassy), Katsura has gradually grown to believe that there are people important to him in Edo, and decides that he no longer wants to destroy the country, but believes there should be a way to change it without causing sacrifices.

character.name: Elizabeth
character.description: Elizabeth resembles a giant white duck or a giant penguin and is Katsura`s companion. Elizabeth was a present from Tatsuma Sakamoto, who presumably picked it up on his travels around space. Although many people consider Elizabeth to be insane and extraneous, Katsura has named the ambiguous avian "Elizabeth" and dotes on it. While it appears to be just one being, Shinpachi purchased a doll named Space Alien Stefan to which looks perfectly similar to Elizabeth. Elizabeth is something of a painter, and is surprisingly dexterous. Also, Elizabeth resorts to using signboards to "communicate", as well as an occasional means of attack. Elizabeth is also a skilled fighter, able to use signboards to fight off swordsmen.

character.name: Otose
character.description: Gintoki`s landlady. He swore to protect her when he ate food offerings to her dead husband. Her real name is Ayano Terada, Ms. Otose being a "genji" alias. She was very pretty when she was young and worked at a restaurant. She secretly fed poor children dumplings for free, and was fired. She is a smoker. Despite constant arguments over Gintoki`s general inability to pay his rent, she is confident in his defence of her.

character.name: Catherine
character.description: An amanto who resembles a cat. At first, she seems to be a diligent worker at Otose`s snack shop who is trying to support her family, but soon reveals herself to be a thief.

character.name: Sadaharu
character.description: Sadaharu has the outward appearance of a giant dog, but is actually an inugami. He was originally owned by a pair of miko sisters (Ane and Mone). His inugami powers are awakened if he consumes both strawberries and milk at the same time. He was named by Kagura, after her first pet, a rabbit which she accidentally killed while having a nightmare. When sitting on his haunches, he is taller than most humans. He was left in front of Gintoki`s apartment in a box that had "To Mr. Freelancer" written on it. Sadaharu chomps on anything smaller than itself, such as Gintoki`s and other people`s heads. Kagura seems to be the only one who can control him, for she has immense strength, though he chomps on her occasionally. Though he was dangerous when Gintoki first received him, he has become quite tame in the later episodes. He even obeys Gintoki at certain points, and has helped the main characters in many occasions. After a certain period of time, even Gintoki (who originally did not want Sadaharu around) refused to abandon Sadaharu or give him back to the miko sisters. Recently, Sadaharu has impressed a yakuza`s boss and receives permission to date his dog (whom Sadaharu himself has fallen in love for).

character.name: Takasugi Shinsuke
character.description: A former comrade of Gintoki and Katsura, and a major antagonist. He now leads a radical Joui faction called the Kiheitai and is known amongst the Shinsengumi as `the most dangerous man in both the Joui faction and amongst the radicals`. He is easily recognisable through his bandaged left eye, his colourful kimono, his eerie smile, and the pipe he is often seen smoking. He, Gintoki, and Katsura studied in the same temple elementary school when they were children, and he fought with them against the Amanto invasion during the latter part of the Joui war. After the war ended, he vanished, and has since gained a dangerous reputation due to his assassination of many of the Bakufu`s main officers and his planning of a large-scale coup d`état. Before his first appearance in both the anime and the manga, he was mentioned to have fled Edo and to have been hiding in Kyoto, although it is unclear how long before this was.

character.name: Kawakami Bansai
character.description: Bansai is described as an assassin and is one of the strongest swordsmen of the Kiheitai; he could also be considered `right-hand man` to Takasugi. Bansai is always seen wearing a pair of sunglasses and large headphones decorated with a yin-yang pattern. Bansai carries a shamisen and is skilled at playing it; it also doubles as a tool for tying others up or as a weapon similar to a garrote, and he carries his hidden katana inside it. As music producer he is known as Tsunpo. Tsunpo is a derogatory term for hearing-impaired persons.

character.name: Kijima Matako
character.description: Matako is the only female member of the Kiheitai and is skilled in using a pair of pistols. She is fiercely loyal to Takasugi, and appears to have a crush on him. She also gets angry and tells off Nizou after he goes on a rampage throughout Edo, trying to kill Takasugi`s old comrades. She is quick-tempered and prone to screeching when she`s upset. This is evident when she has a "spitting fight" with Kagura after she spat at her and when she starts yelling at Kagura after her underwear is said to be stained. She shoots Kagura through the shoulder when Kagura breaks onto the ship. She interacts the most with Takechi, calling him `senpai` and also calling him a `pervert` and a `lolicon` for sparing Kagura instead of killing her. At the end of the Benizakura arc, she is wounded by Okada after he loses control, and that is her last appearance.

character.name: Sakamoto Tatsuma
character.description: Sakamoto is a former member of the Joi. He is a good-natured man and optimistic to the point of being ridiculous, even in the most dangerous situations. His favorite phrase is "AHAHA! It must be _____". He also has a tendency to misspell names; he calls Gintoki "Kintoki". Gintoki often corrects him, citing that if he were named Kintoki, kin means gold (because `Kin` from `Kintoki` instead of `Gin` would make the title `Kintama`, which means `testicles` instead of `Gin Tama`, which means `silver soul`). Despite his goofy nature, Sakamoto is actually a successful businessman in the galaxy. He believes that business is a way of protecting his country. He has a private, well-equipped defensive business fleet. He believes that sacrifices should be made for the good of the community, which is why he chose to abandon his comrades on Earth to travel into space. Sakamoto is shown to be skilled with a pistol in an anime episode. His name is based on the historical character Sakamoto Ryoma.

character.name: Umibouzu
character.description: Kagura and Kamui`s father and one of the last members of the Yato clan. His wife is deceased. Like Kagura, he fights using an umbrella, but is also shown to be strong in his own right. He is one of the few characters able to overpower Kagura. He first appears when an alien appears and takes over the Terminal, helping the Yorozuya defeat the creature. It is revealed that he has a cybernetic arm due to his son claiming his original in battle. After he leaves to travel the galaxy hunting aliens, he`s next heard from in the form of a letter. He tells Kagura that Sadaharu is also a monster they should get rid of. He becomes the leader of the "Principality" in the anime, recruited by a Char Aznable doppelganger. In the manga, he`s recruited by a Darth Vader lookalike. Later in the manga and anime series, he also participated in a hair growing shampoo advertisement, of which the Yorozuya complained that the advertisement was too long.

character.name: Kamui
character.description: Kagura`s brother. He left his family after challenging his father and managing to cut his left arm. He usually shows a cheerful face, but is in fact a violent fighter who lusts for blood, like the majority of the Yato clan. He is the leader of the space pirates Harusame`s 7th squad. Shows great interest in Gintoki, claiming him as his prey.

character.name: Takechi Henpeita
character.description: Apparently, the main strategist behind the Kiheitai faction actions. Claims to be a feminist, but suspected to be a lolicon, one who likes little girls

character.name: Yoshida Shouyou
character.description: Teacher/mentor to the Old Jouishishi members in their youth.

character.name: Imai Nobume
character.description: Alternative: http://img7.anidb.net/pics/anime/198429.jpg [198429.jpg] Current one is full body one, but it`s dark and it`s impossible to see the face. I might find better one once I rewatch the whole thing.

character.name: Oboro
character.description: Oboro is the strongest assassin within the http://anidb.net/ch87781 [Tenshouin Naraku] branch. He is a major antagonist in the series after his introduction in the Courtesan of a Nation Arc. His most remarkable physical trait is the long scar the Naraku caused him on his face during his childhood. The dark circles around his eyes appear to be caused by his anemia. He has light-gray hair and grey eyes. Oboro appears with two different outfits. He initially wore a Buddhist monk robe with the Yatagarasu pattern attached to his robe. He combined it with a large praying bead necklace around his neck. During his first appearance, he disguised himself with a Tengai hat, usually worn by komusous. The Tengai was modified to fire several poison needles. The second outfit Oboro wore during the latest appearances is an attire more akin to a ninja outfit and the Yatagarasu pattern attached to it. His scarf is noticeable as well. During his encounter with http://anidb.net/ch1162 [Gintoki] and http://anidb.net/ch1662 [Takasugi], the latter stabbed his left eye in the same way as as Oboro did to Takasugi during the Joui War. Source: Gintama Wiki

character.name: Hitotsubashi Nobunobu
character.description: Hitotsubashi NobuNobu is the 15th shogun and the head of the Hitotsubashi Faction. He is the son of Hitotsubashi Narinari, part of one of the three branches of the Tokugawa Family. The family had fallen from grace at the end of the Joui Wars when a relative of his lost a battle against the Joui. His father and their retainers were forced to climb back into the government while dodging potential assassination attempts from the leader of the Tokugawa Faction, http://anidb.net/ch53228 [Tokugawa Sadasada]. The shrewd Narinari groomed Nobunobu from birth to become the next Shogun. And ever since, Nobunobu and his faction gathered allies within and outside the government to wait for the chance to usurp Sadasada`s groomed successor, http://anidb.net/ch11860 [Tokugawa Shigeshige], of his position of Shogun. Source: Gintama Wiki, edited.

character.name: Utsuro
character.description: Utsuro is the founder and first leader of the http://anidb.net/ch87781 [Tenshouin Naraku] before http://anidb.net/ch53229 [Oboro] took his position. He is now part of the Tendoshu. Utsuro was born containing a high amount of Altana within his body, granting him ageless immortality and high regenerative capabilities. Unfortunately, he was persecuted by a wary populace who continuously tried to kill him to no avail, leading to them becoming more fearful and greater attempts to kill him, sparking a vicious cycle. To cope with the constant suffering and death, Utsuro created multiple personalities. He was then placed in prison and forgotten about for decades until he was able to leave when his cell door rotted away. But at the same time, Utsuro`s other personalities took over their shared body and decided to kill people, partially as revenge and partially to strive to become human again. He continued being a serial killer until he was caught by the imperial government, who instead of executing him, decided to make him into an assassin, seeing his potential. So he formed and lead the Naraku for 500 years, continuing to slaughter and kill; yet along the way, developed a death wish. The original personality watched in the background at his blood-thirsty personas and wanted to fight back and resist them. Thus he created another personality, http://anidb.net/ch12459 [Yoshida Shouyou]. Shouyou suppressed the other personalities, defected from Naraku, took in a child, and opened a school to teach children. It appeared that Shouyou succeeded in living a life without killing and death. Unfortunately with the Naraku searching for him and opening a ``unique`` school during the Joui Wars, it seemed inevitable that he will be found. Someone reveals his location to the Naraku, and he is arrested with his school destroyed. Before Shouyou was executed by http://anidb.net/ch1162 [Gintoki], the original personality decides to act and kills his other personalities, including Shouyou, to become the only mind in his body. He had decided to end all his personalities` suffering and accept that they will continue to suffer forever. So he concludes that he will end all suffering and emptiness. Utsuro was then revived in front of his former Naraku subordinates, who never knew that their former master was an immortal being who had continuously lead them for centuries. Utsuro was taken to the Tendoushu where tests were run on him about his immortality and he tells the Amanto group about himself. In exchange for sharing his immortality to the Amanto group, he joins the group as a means to find a way to end his suffering. Source: Gintama Wiki, edited.

character.name: Tenshouin Naraku
character.description: The Tenshouin Naraku is a secret assassination group founded by http://anidb.net/ch81990 [Utsuro] that works behind the scenes for the Bakufu government of the Gintama world. They consist of lawless people or orphans that were thrown out from society and were taken in by the group and trained. The Naraku has been known so far to been the most common enemy force that http://anidb.net/ch1162 [Gintoki] and his allies have fought against starting from the Courtesan of a Nation Arc. Source: Gintama Wiki

character.name: Pakuyasa
character.description: Pakuyasa was the person Batou had mistaken http://anidb.net/ch1162 [Gintoki] for during Joui Wars. Batou saw him going through scores of Amanto in order to reach him, and when he did, he introduced himself as Pakuyasa. Apparently, he fought to survive so he could bring food back to his master, Gintoki. Said samurai confirmed this, revealing that Pakuyasa was a rookie whom he believed wasn’t cut out for the battlefield so he had the rookie doing food supply runs. Since he really wasn’t cut out for that, he left to run two failed businesses before settling on doing shady odd jobs. During Batou`s and Gintoki`s fight, Batou fought several clones of Gintoki, who were landing hits on him in order to distract him. One of the clones was created in the image of Pakuyasa. Source: Gintama Wiki, edited.

character.name: Pluto Batou
character.description: Pluto Batou is the captain of the 2nd Division of the http://anidb.net/ch16863 [Harusame] pirates. He is known as the best swordsman in Harusame with the "The Star Sword King" title. He was said to be able to rival http://anidb.net/ch8702 [Kamui] with a sword in his hand. He possess an eye that can see through his opponent`s mind, intention, movement, and even past, and is able to slice off buildings and cleave the ground into half easily with his sword. Source: Gintama Wiki, edited.

character.name: Neptune Shoukaku
character.description: Neptune Shoukaku is the leader of the 4th Division of the http://anidb.net/ch16863 [Harusame] pirates. He is claimed to be the strongest and most athletic assassin of the group. Source: Gintama Wiki

character.name: Uranus Hankai
character.description: Uranus Hankai is the leader and only member of the 3rd Division of the http://anidb.net/ch16863 [Harusame] pirates.

character.name: Shirei
character.description: Shirei is the leader of the 1st Division of the http://anidb.net/ch16863 [Harusame] pirates.

character.name: Kouka
character.description: Kouka is a member of the Yato tribe. She is the wife of http://anidb.net/ch8701 [Umibouzu], and the mother of http://anidb.net/ch1164 [Kagura] and http://anidb.net/ch8702 [Kamui]. She passed away prior to the events of Gintama. Source: Gintama Wiki

character.name: Mutsu (Shoujo Jidai)
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch10786 [Mutsu], as she appeared while she was being tutored by Umibozu as a daugther of the captain of the Chidori Space Pirates.

character.name: Umibouzu
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch8701 [Umibouzu], who was http://anidb.net/ch87945 [Mutsu]`s tutor at the time and a friend of captain of the Chidori Space Pirates.

character.name: Umibouzu
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch8701 [Umibouzu], during the time he met his future wife, http://anidb.net/ch87825 [Kouka].

character.name: Oboro (Shounen Jidai)
character.description: As a child, everyone in Oboro`s home except for him got killed by the members of http://anidb.net/ch87781 [Tenshouin Naraku]. Even though he hid himself, assassins eventually found him and severely wounded him and set his home on fire. At the brink of death, he was saved by http://anidb.net/ch12459 [Yoshida Shouyou], who was part of the Naraku at that time, so that he could survive and hate "him" for as long as "he" would live. After that, Oboro remained at Shouyou`s place and helped him with house chores, since he wanted to serve the man who gave him a reason to live.
